name: Innovative Defense Technologies
subtitle: Software Engineering Intern
description: Mainly worked on developing and inserting a chat tool into a web application on a stack of PostGreSQL, C++, Java, Python, Typescript, and HTML/CSS. I have fixed various bugs and learned various libraries (Underscore, dhtmlx, Foundation) in addition to learning an industry programming workflow (merge requests and branch testing) and best engineering practices.

name: USACE Geospatial Research Labratory
subtitle: Research Scientist Intern
description: Researched a spatial index called the pivot index. I spent a few days reading papers on the pivot index, then developed different Python implementations to optimize K nearest neighbor computational costs.

name: TJ MSTI App Development Camp
subtitle: Teaching Assistant
description: Taught four 1-week summer camp sessions, introducing middle school students to drag-and-drop mobile app development. I led workshops and worked one-on-one with students.

name: Independent
subtitle: Math Tutor
description: Tutored two students weekly in math topics from Pre-Algebra up to Pre-Calculus.
